text: “A leader leads by example, not by force
author: --Sun Tzu

text: “All that is necessary for evil to succeed is for good men to do nothing.
author: --Edmund Burke

text: “A man may die, nations may rise and fall, but an idea lives on.
author: --John F. Kennedy

text: “Anyone, who truly wants to go to war, has truly never been there before!
author: --Larry Reeves

text: “Concentrated power has always been the enemy of liberty.
author: --Ronald Reagan

text: “Diplomats are just as essential in starting a war as soldiers are for finishing it.
author: --Will Rogers

text: “Every tyrant who has lived has believed in freedom - for himself.
author: --Elbert Hubbard

text: “Five second fuses only last three seconds.
author: --Infantry Journal

text: “Freedom is not free, but the U.S. Marine Corps will pay most of your share.
author: --Ned Dolan
